Computing Host¶

class interlinq.components.computing_host.ComputingHost(host_id, controller_host_id, clock, total_qubits=0, total_pre_allocated_qubits=1, gate_time=None)¶

Computing host object which acts as a slave node in a centralised distributed network system, connected to the controller host.

property bits¶

Get the classical bits measured by this host :returns: The dictionary of bits :rtype: (dict)

property controller_host_id¶

Get the controller_host_id associated to the computing host :returns: The ID of controller/master host :rtype: (str)

static extract_gate_param(op)¶

Extract gate parameter array as an np array

Parameters

op (Dict) – Dictionary of information regarding the operation

perform_schedule(ticks)¶

Process the schedule and perform the corresponding operations accordingly

Parameters

(int) – Number of times the clock has ticked

receive_schedule()¶

Receive the broadcasted schedule from the Controller Host and update the schedule property

send_results()¶

Send results to Controller Host

update_total_qubits(total_qubits)¶

Set a new value for total_qubits in the computing host :param (int): Total number of qubits possessed by the computing host
